description:
We are The Accident, Injury, and Disability Attorneys

and

We Will Play Hardball On Your Behalf

Burke, Schultz, Harman & Jenkinson is a West Virginia law firm focused exclusively on representing injured or disabled individuals and their families. From our office in Martinsburg, we serve clients across the Eastern Panhandle of West Virginia and into the Hagerstown area of western Maryland. Whether you have been injured in a motor vehicle accident, you have been harmed by medical malpractice, a loved one was the victim of nursing home abuse or you lost a family member to wrongful death, you can rely on our dedicated advocacy. We can also handle every aspect of the Social Security Disability claims process for you, including appealing denied claims.

Over the past 35 years, our law firm has built a respected reputation for successfully handling such personal injury and Social Security Disability concerns. Our team of attorneys brings more than 100 years of combined experience to each and every case. This means that they have the comprehensive knowledge it takes to pursue optimal results. They are not afraid to play hardball with the insurance companies or Social Security Administration on your behalf.

Striving To Provide The Highest Level Of Customer Service

At Burke, Schultz, Harman & Jenkinson, we believe that our clients deserve stellar legal service. Because of this, we gladly provide evening and weekend appointments and off-site consultations as needed. The initial consultation is always free. Plus, we charge only contingency fees, which means our lawyers only get paid if they recover compensation or benefits for you. Contact our Martinsburg office today to learn more about how we can make a difference for you.
